text: Ana wom khaŋ nzuai, “Gu Fhe Bakɨmera rargɨrga, ana wo muun za suaŋgi bigi, ana ntan muunga.” Ana wom khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu ganɨ, gu Fhe Bakɨme na nɨɨŋgi gumgi, gu mbe phorga ki.” 2.13 Mba Zisas bun nzuai kameŋ Aisaia 17.18 ki. Mba Hibru gava kheri guma, ana khueŋ ndi khɨvi, Zisas ana mba harigi gumgi gu mbigira fara muuŋgi. Mba ana fegi gu ŋgugi gum ana tari ma. Mba harigi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme mben muunga bigi, mbe ntan rarga ki. Zisas ana vhɨra rarga ki.
